comment: Version of ~ drnf2 with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , ~ ax-12 , ~ ax-13 . Instance of ~ nfbidv . Note that the version of ~ axc15 with a disjoint variable condition is actually ~ ax12v2 (up to adding a superfluous antecedent). (Contributed by BJ, 17-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
